text.0:
If you've been waiting for the right time to make an election uncertainty plan — now is it.

Join us on 10/28 for a discussion with @datasociety to learn what experts see as possible scenarios around Election Day and how to plan your coverage responsibly: https://t.co/3ZxtxcWNEk
text.1: If my friends in media read ONE guide in the next wk, please read :backhand_index_pointing_down: ft. tips for reporters covering this unprecedented election. Curated by @PENamerica @firstdraftnews @datasociety @AmPress @protctdemocracy @ElectionTask @wearehearken @TrustingNews https://t.co/No70yCmhYA
text.2:
Does your newsroom have a plan for retaining new subscribers? If so, we invite you to take our reader retention benchmarking survey.

By participating, you'll be able to:
- Measure your tactics against peers’
- Receive customized feedback

Learn more: https://t.co/BQzVCqH0Kj
